title: Donald Trump's campaign against Venezuelan drug boats is rooted in past failure and a hatred of Nicolas Maduro
description: Donald Trump is on a revenge tour during his second stint in the White House and now his gaze has shifted to an enemy who once "humiliated" him — Nicolas Maduro.
content:
As the United States blows up alleged drug boats in international waters near South America, ordinary Venezuelans are arming themselves and joining the military.

title: Did US try to capture Venezuela’s Maduro by bribing pilot of his plane?
description: The United States reportedly tried to buy off the personal pilot of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro in a bid to arrest him. The pilot, in return, was told that he would be made a wealthy man. A US federal agent kept interacting with Maduro's chief pilot even after he retired. Here's what we know about the alleged plan hatched by the US to arrest the strongman and why it failed
content:
The federal agent had a daring pitch for Nicolas Maduro’s chief pilot: All he had to do was surreptitiously divert the Venezuelan president’s plane to a place where US authorities could nab the strongman.
In exchange, the agent told the pilot in a cl... [12419 chars]

title: US Military Targets Suspected Drug Vessel in Eastern Pacific
description: Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth announced a US military strike on a suspected drug boat in the eastern Pacific, resulting in four deaths. The Trump administration's campaign against drug cartels sparks speculation about its true intentions, particularly regarding Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro.
content:
On Wednesday, Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth revealed that the US military conducted a strike on a boat in the eastern Pacific Ocean, believed to be carrying drugs. The operation resulted in the deaths of all four passengers aboard the vessel.

title: Trump should beware of backing regime change in Venezuela

title: Judgment Day Nears in Citgo Auction Battle
description: A U.S. federal judge is set to rule on motions that could disqualify him and advisors overseeing Citgo's auction. The decisions, expected by month's end, follow extensive hearings. content:
The plot, the AP reported, began in April last year when the US embassy in the Dominican Republic received a tip-off. The informant said two aircraft used by Maduro were in the Caribbean nation, undergoing repairs.

title: María Corina Machado cuestiona propuesta de Lula de mediar entre EE.UU. y el chavismo: "No sé que cree que puede lograr"
description: La líder opositora venezolana María Corina Machado expresó su "sorpresa" ante la propuesta de mediación de Lula da Silva entre el chavismo y EE.UU.. Cuestionó los logros pasados de Lula frente a Maduro y afirmó que el pueblo venezolano está ausente en este análisis.

title: Cronología: Así han sido los ataques de EU a 15 “narcolanchas” en aguas del Caribe y el Pacífico
description: El aumento de tensiones empezó en agosto con el despliegue de buques del Ejército estadounidense en el Caribe y con Venezuela en el punto de mira, pero ya se ha extendido a aguas del Pacífico

title: Venezuela realiza operativos antidrogas e intercepta tres aeronaves

title: Los doce ataques de EE.UU. contra lanchas en el Caribe y el Pacífico
description: Los doce ataques de EE.UU. contra lanchas en el Caribe y el Pacífico. El 2 de septiembre Estados Unidos anuncia el primer ataque contra una embarcación y asegura que salieron de Venezuela para transportar drogas hacia norteamérica.
content:
El Ejército de EE.UU. asegura que ha hundido quince embarcaciones y 61 vidas en aguas del Caribe y del Pacífico a raíz de doce ataques, en una nueva etapa de su guerra contra las drogas.
